name: On-site Chef
description: Lead chef providing on-site cooking and coordination.

name: Sous Chef
description: Second-in-command chef to assist with complex menus or large events.

name: Server / Waitstaff
description: Professional staff for table service, bussing, and guest assistance.

name: Bartender
description: Professional bartender for mixing and serving drinks. Does not include alcohol cost.

name: Dishwasher
description: Dedicated staff for washing dishes and kitchen cleanup.

name: Event Captain
description: Manages all front-of-house staff and ensures smooth event flow.

name: Passed Appetizer Service
description: Servers dedicated to passing appetizers to guests during a cocktail hour.

name: Buffet Setup & Management
description: Service for setting up, maintaining, and breaking down a buffet station.

name: Table Setting
description: Service to set tables with dinnerware, glassware, and flatware before the event.

name: Rental Coordination
description: Coordination with rental companies for tables, chairs, linens, etc.

name: Cake Cutting Service
description: Service for cutting and plating a wedding or celebration cake.

name: Coffee & Tea Station
description: Includes setup and maintenance of a self-serve coffee and tea station.

name: Travel Fee (Local)
description: Fee for events within a 30-mile radius.

name: Travel Fee (Long Distance)
description: Fee for events outside a 30-mile radius. Priced per mile.

name: Tasting Fee
description: Fee for a pre-event menu tasting session for up to 4 guests.
